dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so the Toyota Camry, right? Nearly 71,000 sightings in just over a week in Astana. That's just… staggering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so the Toyota Camry, right? Nearly seventy one thousand sightings in just over a week in Astana. That's just... staggering.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The clear leader was the Toyota Camry, recorded by traffic cameras nearly 71,000 times.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, that's a lot of Camrys. But wait, the Chevrolet Cobalt was no slouch either—36,600 times? That's a huge number too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, that's a lot of Camrys. But wait, the Chevrolet Cobalt was no slouch either-thirty six thousand, six hundred times? That's a huge number too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coming in second was the Chevrolet Cobalt with 36,600 appearances, followed by the Hyundai Tucson with 31,500.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And it wasn't just Astana—in Almaty, the Camry still dominated with 67,300 appearances.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And it wasn't just Astana-in Almaty, the Camry still dominated with sixty seven thousand, three hundred appearances.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Toyota Camry again took the top spot, spotted 67,300 times.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But the Cobalt was breathing down its neck there, uh, with 63,000. They're practically tied in popularity between the two cities!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the Cobalt was breathing down its neck there, uh, with sixty three thousand. They're practically tied in popularity between the two cities!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Chevrolet Cobalt followed closely with 63,000 appearances.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's like a two-horse race, honestly. Hyundai Tucson hanging in there for third place both times, but way behind.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like a two-horse race, honestly. Hyundai Tucson hanging in there for third place both times, but way behind.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coming in second was the Chevrolet Cobalt with 36,600 appearances, followed by the Hyundai Tucson with 31,500. Rounding out the top three was the Hyundai Tucson with 38,100.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, around 31 to 38 thousand. So what does that tell us about car preferences in Kazakhstan?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, around thirty one to thirty eight thousand. So what does that tell us about car preferences in Kazakhstan?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coming in second was the Chevrolet Cobalt with 36,600 appearances, followed by the Hyundai Tucson with 31,500. Rounding out the top three was the Hyundai Tucson with 38,100.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they clearly love their sedans—Camry, Cobalt, Elantra, Accent… all in the top five.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they clearly love their sedans-Camry, Cobalt, Elantra, Accent... all in the top five.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Other popular models included the Hyundai Elantra and Hyundai Accent. The Hyundai Elantra and Hyundai Accent also made it into the city's top five most common vehicles.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And all from just a couple of brands, like Toyota, Chevy, Hyundai. Not a lot of variety at the very top.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And all from just a couple of brands, like Toyota, Chevy, Hyundai. Not a lot of variety at the very top.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder about the roads there—are they just flooded with the same few cars day in, day out?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder about the roads there-are they just flooded with the same few cars day in, day out?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: According to Sergek ITS analysts, pretty much! At least on those major avenues they monitored.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: According to Sergek I T S analysts, pretty much! At least on those major avenues they monitored.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Toyota Camry and Chevrolet Cobalt have emerged as the most frequently seen cars on the streets of Kazakhstan's two largest cities, according to analysts from Sergek ITS.
